alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 03 at 9:19AM MST until December 04 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow and freezing rain expected. Total snow accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations around a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Flathead/Mission Valleys. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 9 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation intensity will decrease after midnight, but pockets of light mixed precipitation and black ice will keep slick conditions through the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
